title: how do i verify me email?
body: hey, im new to league of legends, and I'm wondering how to verify my email, im checking my email, and its not there. Is there a way to send the verification again? Any help is appreciated! :D

replies.body:
You can request a verification email from [**this page**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect). Be sure to check your spam folder, since some email providers like to toss our emails there.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
